text: hananimkkeseo neoege bepul-eo jun geos-eulo naese-ui ansigcheoleul guha la geuligo hyeonseeseo neoui mogs-eul mang-gaghaji malmyeo hananimkkeseo neoege seon-eul bepusyeossdeon geoscheoleom seon-eul bepul doe ttang wie haeag-eul peotteuliji mallasillo hananim-eun haeag-eul peotteulineun jaleul salanghaji ani hasinila
